actions.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs

actions.text: Reported to House by House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.  Report No: 98-50.
Called up by House on Call of Consent Calendar.
Laid on Table in House by Voice Vote.
Other Measure S.304 (Amended) Passed House in Lieu.

official_title: A bill to provide for the designation of the Burns Paiute Indian Colony of Oregon as the beneficiary of a public domain allotment and to provide that all interests in public domain allotments in Harney County, Oregon, which are held by Indian allottees who die intestate and without heirs shall escheat to the United States to be held in trust for the benefit of the Burns Paiute Indian Colony of Oregon and added to the Burns Paiute Indian Reservation.

summary.text: Provides for the designation of the Burns Paiute Indian Colony of Oregon as the beneficiary of a specified public domain allotment. Provides that all interests in public domain allotments in Harney County, Oregon, held by Indian allottees who die intestate and without heirs shall be held in trust for the benefit of the Burns Paiute Indian Colony of Oregon and added to the Burns Paiute Indian Reservation.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the designation of the Burns Paiute Indian Colony of Oregon as the beneficiary of a public domain allotment and to provide that all interests in public domain allotments in Harney County, Oregon, which are held by Indian allottees who die intestate and without heirs shall escheat to the United States to be held in trust for the benefit of the Burns Paiute Indian Colony of Oregon and added to the Burns Paiute Indian Reservation.
